00048 class AUDACITY_DLL_API Track: public XMLTagHandler
00049 {
00050 
00051  // To be TrackDisplay
00052  protected:

00062

00067    wxSize vrulerSize;
00068  
00069    // This just returns a constant and can be overriden by subclasses
00070    // to specify a different height for the case that the track is minimized.
00071    virtual int GetMinimizedHeight() const;
00072    int GetActualHeight() { return mHeight; };
00073 
00074    int GetIndex() const;

00100    enum
00101    {
00102       LeftChannel = 0,
00103       RightChannel = 1,
00104       MonoChannel = 2
00105    };
00106 
00107    enum TrackKindEnum
00108    {
00109       None,
00110       Wave,
00111 #if defined(USE_MIDI)

00113 #endif
00114       Label,

00127    // Called when this track is merged with another, and should
00128    // take on some paramaters of its partner.
00129    virtual void Merge(const Track &orig);

00131    wxString GetName() const { return mName; }

00134    void SetDefaultName( wxString n ) { mDefaultName = n; }

00138    bool GetLinked  () const { return mLinked;   }
00139    bool GetSolo    () const { return mSolo;     }
00140 
00141    void SetSelected(bool s) { mSelected = s; }
00142    void SetMute    (bool m) { mMute     = m; }
00143    void SetLinked  (bool l) { mLinked   = l; }
00144    void SetSolo    (bool s) { mSolo     = s; }
00145 
00146    int    GetChannel() const { return mChannel; }
00147    virtual double GetOffset () { return mOffset; }
00148 
00149    void Offset(double t) { SetOffset(GetOffset() + t); }
00150    virtual void SetOffset (double o) { mOffset = o; }
00151 
00152    void SetChannel(int    c) { mChannel = c; }
00153 
00154    // AS: Note that the dirManager is mutable.  This is
00155    // mostly to support "Duplicate" of const objects,
00156    // but in general, mucking with the dir manager is
00157    // separate from the Track.
00158    DirManager* GetDirManager() const { return mDirManager; }
00159 
00160    virtual bool Cut  (double t0, double t1, Track ** dest) {return false;}
00161    virtual bool Copy (double t0, double t1, Track ** dest) {return false;}
00162    virtual bool Clear(double t0, double t1) {return false;}
00163    virtual bool Paste(double t, Track * src) {return false;}
00164 
00165    // This can be used to adjust a synchro-selected track when the selection
00166    // is replaced by one of a different length.
00167    virtual bool SyncAdjust(double oldT1, double newT1);
00168 
00169    virtual bool Silence(double t0, double t1) {return false;}
00170    virtual bool InsertSilence(double t, double len) {return false;}
00171 
00172    virtual int GetKind() const { return None; }
00173 
00174    // XMLTagHandler callback methods
00175 
00176    virtual bool HandleXMLTag(const wxChar *tag, const wxChar **attrs) = 0;
00177    virtual XMLTagHandler *HandleXMLChild(const wxChar *tag) = 0;
00178    virtual void WriteXML(XMLWriter &xmlFile) = 0;
00179 
00180    // Returns true if an error was encountered while trying to
00181    // open the track from XML
00182    virtual bool GetErrorOpening() { return false; }
00183 
00184    virtual double GetStartTime() { return 0.0; }
00185    virtual double GetEndTime() { return 0.0; }
00186 
00187    // Checks if linking is on and any track in its group is selected
00188    bool IsSynchroSelected();
00189 };

00207    virtual Track *Next(bool skiplinked = false);

00209    virtual Track *Last(bool skiplinked = false);
00210

00212    Track *RemoveCurrent(bool deletetrack = false); // returns next

00289 //
00290 // TrackGroupIterator
00291 //
00292 // Based on TrackListIterator returns only tracks belonging to the group
00293 // in which the starting track is a member.
00294 //
00295 class AUDACITY_DLL_API TrackGroupIterator: public TrackListIterator
00296 {
00297  public:
00298    TrackGroupIterator(TrackList * val);
00299    virtual ~TrackGroupIterator() {};
00300 
00301    // Iterate functions
00302    Track *First(Track *member);
00303    Track *Next(bool skiplinked = false);
00304    Track *Prev(bool skiplinked = false);
00305    Track *Last(bool skiplinked = false);
00306 
00307  private:
00308    bool mInLabelSection;
00309 };

00324 
00329 // Posted when the horizontal positions within tracks have beed updated.  The
00330 // wxCommandEvent::GetClientData() method can be used to retrieve the first
00331 // track that was updated.  All positions following that track will have been
00332 // updated as well.
00333 DECLARE_EXPORTED_EVENT_TYPE(AUDACITY_DLL_API, EVT_TRACKLIST_RESIZED, -1);
00334 
00335 // Posted when tracks have been added or deleted from a tracklist.  The pointer
00336 // wxCommandEvent::GetClientData() returns will be NULL for deletions or the
00337 // track that was added.
00338 DECLARE_EXPORTED_EVENT_TYPE(AUDACITY_DLL_API, EVT_TRACKLIST_UPDATED, -1);
